articles.title: Google's Podcast app to shut down from tomorrow. Here's how you can transfer your subscriptions | Mint - Mint
articles.description: Google Podcasts app with over 500 million downloads is shutting down on April 2 in the US. Users urged to migrate data to YouTube Music or another service. Podcasts can still be downloaded but not streamed after the shutdown date.
